meanings.definition: The state or fact of being possible.
meanings.sent1: The possibility of rain tomorrow is high.
meanings.sent2: There is a possibility of winning the game if we play well.
meanings.sent3: The possibility of finding a unicorn in the backyard is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The possibility of time travel opens up a whole new world of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The bright rainbow painted a vivid possibility of hope in the sky.

meanings.definition: A thing that may happen or be the case.
meanings.sent1: She considered the possibility of going to the beach this weekend.
meanings.sent2: The possibility of a surprise party made her excited.
meanings.sent3: The possibility of a penguin wearing a top hat is amusing to think about.
meanings.sent4: The possibility of a tree growing money seemed like a far-fetched dream.
meanings.sent5: The shining star in the night sky symbolized endless possibilities.
